programme.desc: Semasa perjalanan ke kampung Gingka, rakan-rakan Gingka diuji oleh Hyoma yang mendedahkan dirinya sebagai kawan lama Gingka.

programme.title: Tsurupika Hagemaru Ep37
programme.desc: Hagemaru merupakan anak tunggal keluarga Hageta yang kedekut dan sering mencari jalan untuk berjimat-cermat dalam pembelanjaan.

programme.title: New Doraemon Ep137
programme.desc: Siri terbaharu Doraemon, sebuah kucing robot bersama Nobita serta rakan-rakannya dalam menjalani kehidupan harian yang penuh aksi yang melucukan.

programme.title: SMK Ep02
programme.desc: Pelajar perempuan mengajak Adam untuk membalas dendam terhadap Endi, si kaki prank yang suka mengenakan mereka. Adam terperangkap dalam perang prank di antara pelajar lelaki dan pelajar perempuan.

programme.title: Family Spy Ep02
programme.desc: Daniel menyiasat kes kehilangan Rin, tanpa menghiraukan perasaan Roz dan Indah. Roz menghubungi rakan lamanya sebagai usaha menyelamatkan Rin. Adakah Roz akan kembali ke dunia perisikan demi cucunya Rin?

programme.title: Kampung Boy S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Nikmati animasi terbaik hasil nukilan Dato' Lat yang penuh kreatif lagi menghiburkan ini istimewa untuk tontonan anda sekeluarga!

programme.title: Dee The Series Ep09
programme.desc: Dee, bersama ibunya, Amy dan adiknya Mia memulakan hidup baru di Kuala Lumpur apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia yang baru untuk Dee di kolej itu.

programme.title: Ultraman Zero The Chronicles HD Ep24
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero iaitu anak legenda Ultraseven menerima latihan daripada Ultraman Leo untuk menjadi pejuang yang berkelayakan. Apabila tanah airnya, Land of Light diancam oleh sekumpulan raksasa

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fusion Ep08
programme.desc: Doji menghantar Kyoya ke Wolf Canyon untuk membuktikan kemahirannya. Gingka sangka dia menyertai rancangan tetapi sebenarnya komputer Merci yang menguji kemahirannya.

programme.title: Cucu Nek Putih
programme.desc: Kisah seorang nenek yang harus menurunkan ilmu sihir kepada cucunya. Setelah mewarisi ilmu dari neneknya, Suri kelihatan seperti wanita gila dan penduduk kampung mula bercakap tentangnya.

programme.title: Sinister 2
programme.desc: Courtney Collins bersama kedua anaknya Dylan dan Zach telah berpindah ke sebuah rumah di luar bandar. Kisah bermula apabila Dylan dan Zach mampu melihat kejadian yang pernah terjadi di rumah tersebut.

programme.title: Kifarah Buta
programme.desc: Minat Zahid terhadap muzik telah membawanya kepada Suraya, seorang gadis yang menjadi mangsa ketamakkan abangnya Kamal.

programme.title: Sneak Peek i-Tanggang Ep18
programme.desc: Sneak Peek episod 7. Saksikan 'i-Tanggang' setiap Isnin pukul 9 malam di Astro Citra saluran 108.

programme.title: Anais Patah Hati Pertama Kali
programme.desc: Anais, seorang chef membuat pastri berusia 30-an, putus cinta untuk pertama kalinya dalam hidup, dan menghadapi masalah untuk mengawal emosinya.

programme.title: Peraturan
programme.desc: Seorang pembunuh bersiri memilih mangsa berdasarkan kesalahan trafik. Seorang anggota polis cuba untuk menghalang dan membongkar motif di sebalik segalanya.

programme.title: Remp-It
programme.desc: Filem penuh aksi tentang kehidupan sekumpulan pelumba motorsikal haram di Kuala Lumpur. Dibintangi oleh Farid Kamil, Firdee Aqasha, Zulhuzaimy Marzuki, Julia Hana dan Cat Farish.

programme.desc: Special Clip episod 7. Saksikan drama bersiri i-Tanggang setiap Isnin, 9 malam di saluran Astro Citra 108.

programme.desc: Rahsia yang di simpan selama 30 tahun akhirnya terbongkar dan menimbulkan konflik dalam 2 buah keluarga yang berada di Kuala Lumpur dan juga Yogyakarta.

programme.title: Lagenda Budak Setan
programme.desc: Kisah cinta yang tragis ini diadaptasi dari novel popular judul yang sama ke layar perak. Dibintangi oleh Lisa Surihani, Farid Kamil, Que Haidar, Shila Mambo dan Raja Farah.

programme.title: Deadly Contract
programme.desc: Yan Jian, jurutera IT dari China memasuki pertandingan di Afrika untuk memenangi hak mengawal sisten komunikasi antara Barat dan Timur. Yan mendapati wujudnya konspirasi dalam pertandingan tersebut.

programme.title: Rock
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sekumpulan anak-anak muda dalam sebuah band rock yang pernah memasang impian untuk jadi terkenal. Lakonan Hasnul Rahmat dan Que Haidar

programme.title: Penanggal
programme.desc: Kisah Murni yang secara tidak sengaja mewarisi ilmu penanggal daripada Mak Ajeng dan terpaksa pula melarikan diri ke Kampung Jawa demi perlindungannya. Lakonan Fasha Sandha, Ummi Nazeera, Azri Iskandar dan Zul Ariffin. Arahan Ellie Suriaty Omar.

programme.title: 3 A.M. Bangkok Ghost Stories Ep07
programme.desc: Seorang akauntan bertemu dengan seorang gadis di dalam bas yang membawa kepadanya pengalaman yang mengerikan pada pukul 3 pagi.

programme.title: 3 A.M. Bangkok Ghost Stories (Series) Ep08
programme.desc: Misi sukarela pertama tiga budak pengakap dengan unit penyelamat pada malam yang menyeramkan.

programme.title: Kelaster

programme.title: Make Me Shudder

programme.title: Maut
programme.desc: Filem ini menghimpunkan 3 kisah yang membawa keinsafan tentang saat-saat di ambang kematian. Dibintangi oleh Que Haidar, Liyana Jasmay dan Sabrina Hassan.

programme.title: Kupilih Jalanku Sendiri
programme.desc: Rafazah seorang peguam pencegah rasuah tetapi ternyata bapa mertuanya terlibat dalam rasuah yang akan mempertaruhkan nama baiknya. Mampukah Rafazah berhadapan dengan masalah tersebut?

programme.title: Puyah & Putat

programme.title: Pak Dogo

programme.title: Minah Moto

programme.title: Malaysian Ghost Stories Ep31
programme.desc: Jasmine yang kemurungan setelah kematian anak sulungnya membeli sebuah boneka yang comel. Namun tanpa disedari boneka itu adalah boneka puaka yang diperbuat daripada tuala wanita terpakai.

programme.title: Malaysian Ghost Stories Ep32
programme.desc: Perniagaan Nora mula terganggu apabila wujud gerai baru bersebelahan gerainya. Semakin hari keadaan semakin teruk sehingga mereka menemukan belalang pelesit yang muncul di gerai mereka.

programme.title: Malaysian Ghost Stories Ep33
programme.desc: Kila bergegas pulang ke kampung setelah mendapat berita kematian neneknya seorang bidan tersohor. Pelbagai cerita aneh didengari Kila mengenai neneknya dan tanpa dia sedari sesuatu sedang menunggunya.

programme.title: Malaysian Ghost Stories Ep34
programme.desc: Walaupun jasad Bidan Nek Nah telah mati namun ilmunya masih hidup. Kila yang terbelenggu mewarisi ilmu neneknya telah mengamalkan ilmu tersebut secara tidak sengaja.

programme.title: Kompilasi Di Sebalik ATNM Minggu 7 Ep07
programme.desc: Saksikan persiapan menjelang konsert mingguan All Together Now Malaysia yang akan bersiaran setiap Ahad jam 9 malam di Astro Ria.

programme.title: (L) AWANI 7:45/ Sinar AWANI
programme.desc: Sinar AWANI membawakan perkembangan berita-berita utama.

programme.title: hlive! 2021 Ep181
programme.desc: Yang Hip, Yang Hangat! Rancangan berita hiburan dalam dan luar negara secara eksklusif di hlive! Hiburan Tanpa Henti!

programme.title: Hero Remaja 2021 Ep06
programme.desc: Rancangan realiti yang menempatkan 12 peserta lelaki melalui pelbagai cabaran bersaing untuk memenangi Hero Remaja 2021, hanya seorang yang akan dinobatkan sebagai ikon Hero Remaja yang seterusnya.

programme.title: The Spongebob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: Apabila lanun yang jahat mencuri formula rahsia Krabby Patty, SpongeBob dan musuhnya Plankton bergabung untuk mendapatkan semula formula itu.

programme.title: I Heart You Cik Yah
programme.desc: Zulkefli dan Badariah tidak sehaluan namun kerana ingin menyelamatkan kilang tempat mereka bekerja daripada ditutup oleh Qarina, mereka harus bekerjasama. Daripada benci timbul perasaan cinta.

programme.title: Obsesiku Ep04
programme.desc: Obsesiku mengetengahkan peminat fanatik seluruh negara yang mengikuti perjalanan selebriti kesayangan mereka dari awal hingga kini. Ada di antara mereka yang akan menerima kejutan dari selebriti kesayangan

programme.title: The Ku Cin Show Ep11
programme.desc: Membawa penonton menyelami kehidupan seharian selebriti dan kucing peliharaan mereka. Selain itu selebriti dan kucing mereka akan diberi cabaran yang direka khas untuk rancangan ini.

programme.title: The Experiment Ep01
programme.desc: Terdapat ramai pencetus dan pembikin idea diluar sana yang ingin hasil kerja mereka di lihat oleh ramai penonton. Experiment adalah platform untuk mereka ketengahankan bakat ini.

programme.title: Alternatif Ep37
programme.desc: Alternatif merupakan sebuah program yang memaparkan gaya hidup remaja zaman ini.

programme.title: Mimi Amah Diva
programme.desc: Mimi Mia, seorang pelakon tidak popular terdesak untuk mencipta nama. Dia sanggup menyamar untuk bekerja sebagai orang gaji di rumah produser terkenal, Taufik bagi mencapai hasratnya.

programme.title: Lelaki Kiriman Tuhan Ep01
programme.desc: Naira semakin tertekan dengan pelbagai masalah yang dihadapinya. Kehadiran Raid ke resort membawa sinar seolah dia adalah Lelaki Kiriman Tuhan.

programme.title: Go Shop
programme.desc: Rancangan yang memberi informasi mengenai pelbagai produk yang boleh didapati di Go Shop

programme.title: Liga Masjid
programme.desc: Cerita ini mengenai Pak Tham bercita-cita membuat satu pertandingan bola sepak untuk menarik minat orang kampung terutamanya anak muda supaya dekat dengan masjid.

programme.title: MeleTOP S9 Ep51
programme.desc: Rancangan hiburan yang padat dengan segala yang 'trendy' lagi sensasi, dari pentas hiburan tempatan dan antarabangsa. Dihoskan oleh NABIL dan pengacara jemputan - pastinya kelakar, dan 'meletop'!

programme.title: (L) Go Shop
programme.desc: Rancangan yang memberi informasi mengenai pelbagai produk yang boleh didapati di Go Shop

programme.title: h+ Ep18
programme.desc: Apa yang hangat diperkatakan sepanjang minggu ini? Saksikan H Plus untuk ketahui berita-berita hiburan yang dibawakan secara santai dan infomatif.

programme.title: 3 Gadis Manis Ep05
programme.desc: Nina, Jo dan Mar tinggal bersama. Dari luaran nampak okay tapi setiap mereka bergelut dengan isu peribadi.

programme.title: MegaDrama: The Hotel Ep19
programme.desc: Raisa terkejut apabila mendapat tahu yang Sean secara tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Raisa bengang bila Umar enggan beritahu di mana Sean berada dan cuba untuk membuat sesuatu kepada Umar.

programme.title: MegaDrama: The Hotel Ep20
programme.desc: Raisa tekad menculik Umar. Raisa siksa dan ugut Umar jika dia buat sesuatu, Raisa akan cedarakan Umaira. Sean yang larikan diri kembali kepada Raisa apabila mendapat tahu Raisa cederakan Umar.

programme.title: MegaDrama: The Hotel Ep21
programme.desc: Sean yang telah membuat sesuatu kepada Raisa tergesa-gesa telefon Dr.Firhani untuk menyelamatkannya. Umaira berasa pelik bila Dr.Firhani tahu namanya dan tinggal dirumah lama Sean.

programme.title: MegaDrama: The Hotel Ep22
programme.desc: Dr. Firhani terdengar perbualan Julia dan penyiasat persendirian tentang kes pembunuhan yang dulu. Sean mula risau takut diburu polis dan berkomplot dengan Raisa untuk lari keluar negara.

programme.title: Hero Remaja 2021 Ep06
programme.desc: Rancangan realiti yang menempatkan 12 peserta lelaki melalui pelbagai cabaran bersaing untuk memenangi Hero Remaja 2021, hanya seorang yang akan dinobatkan sebagai ikon Hero Remaja yang seterusnya.

programme.title: Gunting The Series Ep09
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Taufik yang berkerja sebagai hairstylist di Los Angeles kembali ke Singapura untuk menjaga bapanya.

programme.title: CCTV 2021 Ep20
programme.desc: Ikuti perkembangan terkini tentang pelbagai rancangan baharu yang segar menarik di layar kaca tv anda. Juga ikuti temu bual eksklusif bersama artis dan karyawan di sebalik tabir.

programme.title: Mulut Masin
programme.desc: Lima saudara menyangka mereka telah disumpah oleh nenek mereka selepas kehilangan wasiat terakhirnya. Kini mereka perlu mencari wasiat itu sebelum sumpahan memisahkan keluarga mereka.

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: A drifter (David Chiang) and another swordsman (Ti Lung) are competitors for a woman's love who fate turns into brothers in arms.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: Actress Li Li Hua, star of over 60 films since 1947, beautifully portrays the disgraced wife of a peddler in the final days of the Ching Dynasty.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Lauded as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals of the 60s, this award-winning piece starring Linda Lin Dai as a dancer who finds romance with her boss's son.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: In true Huangmei opera style, lovely Li Hsiang-chun stars as a used and abused beauty in director Kao Li's restrained, as well as sadistic tearjerker.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: The Shaw Brothers' directors created this 60's classic depicting a timeless romance between a wealthy man and a songbird.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: A village boy recruits his friends to help peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: Dubbed Little Bastard due to never having known his parents, a young man seeks his roots, with help from a staunch ally called Little Beggar.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The 'iron triangle' comprising director Chang Cheh and stars David Chiang and Ti Lung produces this explosive kung fu epic.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: This sequel captures how singer Tang Qi searches through battle-scarred China for her soldier lover, Xing Ya. However, are they fated to be apart?

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: 17-year-old Wong Fei Hung is prompted to go and do battle to avenge a friend's death and protect his family honour.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: A hero (Chen Kuan Tai) battles assassins who use a deadly, beheading weapon to kill dissidents.

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: Director Chang Cheh joins forces with Ni Kuang and martial arts choreographer Liu Chia-liang to craft this brilliant saga from the golden age of kung fu films.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: When a detective's bullet changes direction in mid-air to zero in on its target, a terrifying supernatural connection comes to light.

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Essie Lin Chia plays an evil lady warrior who raises the son of a swordsman who scorned her with a blood-curdling ulterior motive in mind.

programme.title: The House of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: This fascinating, humorous box office smash captures a cross-section of Hong Kong society and their issues -- all crammed into a single tenement building.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: This comedy centres on the residents of a females-only apartment who hail from different backgrounds and make money in varied ways.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: One of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screen, this classic stars the husband-and-wife team of Peter Chen and Betty Loh.

programme.title: The Naval Commandos
programme.desc: Tony Liu, Ti Lung, Fu Sheng, David Chiang and Shih Szu star in this rousing epic of a near suicidal mission to destroy the Japanese Navy's flagship in 1937.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: This epic depicts the romance between the Jade Emperor's seventh daughter and a young village man. When Heaven and Earth meet, can a common ground be found?

programme.title: Judgement of an Assassin
programme.desc: This tale of the 100 Poison Clique's obsessive ambition to destroy all rivals climaxes in a bloody clash involving a mass murderer's trial.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: Winner of Best Picture in the 12th Asian Film Festival, this Huangmei Opera epic stars Li Li Hua and Ivy Ling Po in a romance that stretches across the decades.

programme.title: All Men Are Brothers
programme.desc: This sequel depicts how the brothers of the Water Margin embark on a hunt for the thieves. Will they succeed and if so, at what cost?

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: This classic romance stars Linda Lin and Kwan Shan, capturing a touching love story between a famous nightclub singer and a young architect.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Fans of 'The Little Mermaid' are in for a delightful surprise when they see this spectacular Chinese operatic adaptation, where a carp turns into a fairy.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: Superstars Ti Lung and David Keung team up for in this 71' classic about a young man who is exiled after his godfather's death, but returns with a vengeance.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: In this chapter of the 'Journey to the West' saga, the Monkey King and his gang are confronted by a whole host of fanciful villains.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: A series of comical events follow when a petty thief, a roguish security guard & a potty-mouthed woman find their lives intersecting one day over a lost gun & a heist.

programme.title: Fooling Around Jiang Hu
programme.desc: A goodhearted gangleader who faces a threat from his assistant fights back the best way he knows how - by singing!

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Oscar winner Jean-Jacques Annaud pair up William Chan and Jelly Lin for their first collaboration to tell the story of Genghis Khan, who battles countless hardships en route to becoming the God of War.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars a railroad worker who leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to help the poor. Tao, Wang Kai & Darren Wang co-star in this action-comedy film.

programme.title: To Love or Not to Love
programme.desc: Casey had her heart broken by her high school boyfriend, Elton. Three years later, Casey now much choose between the perfect guy, Adam and Elton as the truth behind Elton's betrayal is revealed.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three-armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor & his assistant must put up the fight of their lives to stop them from obtaining a bullet that is a key piece of evidence.

programme.title: Love is...Pyjamas
programme.desc: As her boss struggles to save his sinking company, underwear designer Spring finds herself up against a new employee in a race to create a new fashion line.

programme.title: The Big Call
programme.desc: Starring Gwei Lun Mei, Joseph Chang & Cheney Chen, this crime drama depicts how a young cop goes undercover to bring down a slick group of criminals specializing in mobile fraud.

programme.title: The Bullet Vanishes
programme.desc: Two cops stumble upon a conspiracy in the wake of the death of a girl accused of 'stealing bullets.'Risking their own lives, they set out to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Never Said Goodbye
programme.desc: Zhou Dong Yu won 2016 MIMF Best Actress for her role in this romance in which a student fakes his own funeral to help the girl he loves deal with her grief.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: A violent shootout between the police and a group of gangsters 20 years ago sparks another bloodbath involving the surviving team members.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A remake from the Japanese movie Key of Life, Andy Lau, Xiao Yang and Wan Qian stars in this action comedy about the switched identities of an unsuccessful actor & a professional assassin.

programme.title: The Foreigner
programme.desc: Starring Jackie Chan and Pierce "James Bond" Brosnan, this epic film sees a humble businessman with a buried past seeking justice when his daughter is killed in an act of terrorism.

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a happy plus-sized girl working as a mascot at a theme park. However, when a weight loss competition turns her into a vain internet icon, she begins to lose the people she loves.

programme.title: Bio Raiders
programme.desc: A famed doctor concocts an elixir of immortality to save his terminally ill daughter, but it involves drinking human blood. Twenty years later, the doctor's assistant makes a terrifying discovery.

programme.title: Xiao Ming & His Buddies
programme.desc: This heart-warming comedy will have you shedding tears of laughter. While burglarizing a bungalow, Liu Bei and his gang of dim-witted thieves meet their match in little Xiao Ming and his friends.

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 3
programme.desc: Karen Mok reprises her iconic character after two decades in this tale of a girl who tries to redirect fate to ensure she & her true love stay alive.

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: Jackie Chan's highest box office masterpiece! This one billion global box office hit depicts an archeology professor and his team in search of a lost ancient Indian treasure.

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: This drama revolves around five people living at a peaceful home for the elderly, managed by a retired doctor with assistance from his long-time nurse.

programme.title: With Prisoners
programme.desc: Starring Neo Yau and Kelvin Kwan, this Hong Kong movie portrays young inmates are physically and mentally abused daily in a detention centre.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: Winner of 9 awards at the 32nd Hong Kong Film Awards! When a police van is hijacked, Deputy Commissioner M.B Lee launches a rescue operation codenamed Cold War.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel features the plight of Hong Kong's grassroots performing artists fighting against the government's plan to gentrify an industrial district where they lived.

programme.title: The Bravest Escort Group
programme.desc: This historical drama follows a band of courageous bodyguards as they set out to escort the General Ma Bao's daughter Yuanyuan & her son - the Ming Dynasty's last hope, to safety.

programme.title: Never Too Late

programme.title: Walking Tall (2004)
programme.desc: Enlisting the help of his old pal, a retired soldier gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown from crime, drugs and violence.

programme.desc: The gang of animals joins a travelling circus to get home to New York.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Peppa's car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dog's garage isn't far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppa's car back to his garage.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep420

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep501

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Calvin goes to Dinosaur Jungle to find a rare golden egg. But when the volcano, Mount Rumble, shakes the ground and a boulder hurtles towards Calvin, he must activate his PLAY POWER and rescue the egg.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep203

programme.desc: Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls. George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built. But when it starts to rain, they rush out to play together in the muddy puddles!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep235
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop on. Peppa and George think it is the best train ever!

programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep148
programme.desc: Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep149
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep150
programme.desc: It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep105
programme.desc: When Kaison's car gets tangled and breaks down, Calvin and ROBO G try to fix it with their FAST FIXIT machine but it gets jammed inside the machine. Calvin has to use his PLAY POWER to fix it, and fast!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep106
programme.desc: It's time for the ULTIMATE RACE DAY - on a race track built in the Kid Cave. But when the track gets broken mid race, Calvin must use his PLAY POWER to pull off the most epic stunt jump ever!

programme.title: Ready Set Dance S2 Ep207
programme.desc: In the robot factory, Christian the robot needs some repairs...The Kid Crew know what to do!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep204
programme.desc: It's a sweet day at Blue's Bakery as they are baking bibingka, a cake from the Philippines! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who Blue wants to bake for, and help the Banana Baker with her Monkey Muffins!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep993
programme.desc: The Duke of Flappington takes the Princess' gem and uses its magical powers to raise Barkingburg into the sky! Can Skye lead the team in their biggest aerial rescue yet? Get ready to JET TO THE RESCUE!

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep111
programme.desc: In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around.
